cannot be replicated.

309995.家具を１個 加工することで その家具が\n配置上限数以内なら 好きなだけ取り出せ:
By processing a piece of furniture, it becomes a "replica furniture" that can be taken out as many times as you like as long as the number
of the furniture is within the limit for placement. You can select the destination from "items", "itemwarehouse", "furniture storage",
and "currently placed furniture". Select the destination from "Process" and check the checkbox of the furniture you want to make
into a replica. If you make a replica furniture, it will be removed from "items", "itemwarehouse", and "furniture storage". In
the case of "Furniture in Placement", the selected furniture will disappear and a replica furniture will be placed in the same
position. Replicas cannot be made from the "Evacuated furniture" in "Placed furniture" when moving or rebuilding, and must be placed
from "Place replica furniture" in the "Housing" item menu or from "Replica furniture" in the "Door" menu. Please place
the replica furniture. Once you have placed a replica furniture, it will not be returned to "items" and cannot be stored in "furniture
storage" or in any other storage. Replica furniture cannot be placed in someone else's home. They cannot be traded or sold. Some
furniture cannot be made into replicas. You cannot make a replica furniture if it does not have a Wardrobe icon in the "See More"
section. Black Wardrobe icon is a furniture that can be made into a replica. A white Wardrobe icon indicates a furniture that can
be made into a replica. Replicated furniture will be marked with a white Wardrobe icon in the "Furniture in Placement" section.

309996.庭具を１個 加工することで その庭具が\n配置上限数以内なら 好きなだけ取り出せ:
By processing one garden furniture, it becomes a "replica garden furniture" that can be taken out as many times as you like as long as the
number of garden furniture is within the placement limit. You can select the processing destination from "items", "itemwarehouse",
"furniture storage", and "garden furniture in place". Select the destination from "Process" and check the checkbox of the garden furniture
you want to make a replica. If you make replica garden furniture, it will be removed from "items", "itemwarehouse", and "furniture
storage". In the case of "Garden furniture in place", the selected garden furniture will disappear and a replica garden furniture will
be placed in the same position. Replicas cannot be made from the "Evicted garden furniture" of the "Placed garden furniture"
when moving or rebuilding, but can be made from the "Placing replica garden furniture" in the "Housing" item menu or from the "Replica
garden furniture" in the "Door" menu. Replica garden furniture" in the "Housing" menu of the "item" menu or "Replica garden furniture" in
the "Door" menu. If you put replica garden furniture, it will not return to "items" and cannot be stored in "furniture storage" or
storage. Replica garden furniture cannot be placed in someone else's home. They cannot be traded or sold. Some garden furniture cannot
be made into replicas. If there is no Wardrobe icon in the "See More" section, it cannot be made into a replica garden furniture. Black
Wardrobe icons are garden furniture that can be made into replicas. White Wardrobe icons are garden furniture that can be made into
replicas. Replicated garden furniture will be marked with a white Wardrobe icon in the "Garden furniture in place" section.
